title: i need help
body: i want to get back my account pls riot help mee my account name is k joko

replies.body: I'm afraid I don't really understand the issue going on, and the details provided doesn't give me too much to look up.  If you're having trouble accessing your account, I recommend using our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help!  Otherwise, let me know what's going on in more detail.
